name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers, paid in three equal installments.
eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land up to 2 hectares. Institutional land holders and income tax payees are excluded.
benefits: ₹2,000 transferred directly into beneficiary bank accounts every four months (April-July, August-November, December-March).
subsidy_details: Central Sector Scheme fully funded by Government of India. Beneficiaries must complete e-KYC.
application_process: Register via PM-KISAN portal (pmkisan.gov.in), Common Service Centres (CSCs), or local agriculture offices.

name: Mahadbt - Horticulture Crop Insurance
description: Insurance coverage for horticulture farmers against natural calamities, pests, and diseases for notified crops.
eligibility: Horticulture farmers in Maharashtra growing notified crops (mango, pomegranate, citrus, etc.) and enrolled on MahaDBT.
benefits: Premium subsidy up to 75% depending on crop category. Compensation based on crop loss assessment.
subsidy_details: State funded subsidy credited via MahaDBT. Balance premium payable by farmer.
application_process: Apply on https://mahadbt.maharashtra.gov.in/ with land records, crop details, and bank account information.

name: National Mission on Medicinal Plants - Maharashtra
department: Maharashtra State Horticulture & Medicinal Plant Board
description: Financial assistance for cultivation, post-harvest management, and marketing of medicinal plants.
eligibility: Farmers, SHGs, and cooperatives cultivating approved medicinal plants with minimum 0.1 ha area.
benefits: Up to ₹40,000/ha for cultivation, 50% subsidy for shade nets, nurseries, and post-harvest infrastructure.
subsidy_details: Cost norms as per National AYUSH Mission. Subsidy released in installments after field verification.
application_process: Submit proposal to District Horticulture Office or apply via Maharashtra SHMPB portal.
contact_info: Maharashtra State Horticulture & Medicinal Plant Board, Pune – 020-24529184
